alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 11:13PM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Russell and Lincoln Counties. * WHEN...Now until noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Wind chills in the single digits are likely on Saturday. Travel could become hazardous in areas of blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is expected to be a break in the snow early tonight with another band of snow affecting the area late tonight through Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
